title: I Want to Know Too!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Hey, hey, Nozomi-san! What’s a washi washi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eh....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I saw Ayumu-chan and Rina-chan practicing the washi washi~. But that was just the trial version, right? Can you teach it to me too~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eeeh.... Hmm.... What should I do....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I want to know, I want to know!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>....Okay! Washi washi is.... something like this~~~ Washi washi washi~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Kyahahahaha! That tickles~! I’m gonna get you back! Revenge washi washi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ahaha, you’re pretty good~, Chikacchi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>That was really fun! Can I tell Ayumu-chan and the others that this is the real washi washi?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Uhh, that would be.... Just wait for a bit more! I should take the responsibility of teaching them myself.... probably....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
